name: boilerplate-react-client-express-server
description: A boilerplate template to build apps with React and Node

scripts.pro-server: cd server && npm run installation && npm start
scripts.pro-deploy-client: cd client && npm run installation && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run dev-deploy-client && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run dev-server

author: Riccardo riccardop@outlook.com
